model.name: PDCA Link Failure - Another DORY Moment
model.description: PDCA links are not working again, indicating another DORY moment where I'm creating broken GitHub links. This is a recurring pattern of failure that needs immediate correction.
model.rationale: Broken PDCA links indicate systematic failure in documentation and git protocol compliance. This is a recurring DORY pattern that undermines all documentation efforts.
acceptance_criteria: Fix all broken PDCA links immediately
Use proper GitHub URL format with commit hash

link_failure_pattern.recurring_issue: Multiple DORY moments with same problem
link_failure_pattern.solution: Use fix.dual.link tool or manual correction

technical_details.incorrect_format: Relative paths or wrong commit references

model.implementation_notes: This is a recurring DORY failure pattern. Fix immediately and implement prevention measures.
